typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(eid = substring(Column_1, 1, 1),
		ename = substring(Column_1, 4, 10),
		esal = substring(Column_1, 12, 17)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		eid,
		ename,
		esal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		eid as integer,
		ename as string,
		esal as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		eid,
		ename,
		esal
	)) ~> sink1
